name: Peri Magic
summary: The shimmering embers of the righteous peris crackle at your fingertips.
description:
The shimmering embers of the righteous peris crackle at your fingertips. You can cast glitterdust and status each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.Traits

Aasimar: A creature with this trait has the aasimar versatile heritage. Aasimars are planar scions descended from celestial beings. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by aasimars.
